people_also_ask.question: Why does Silent Hill 2 cost so much?
people_also_ask.heading: 1. Silent Hill 2. Some expensive games are coveted due to a limited release with few copies in circulation, while others are part of a larger series valuable to collectors. This is not the case for the original version of Silent Hill 2, which has maintained its high resale price entirely because of how good it is.
people_also_ask.title: Why is Silent Hill 2 so expensive? - Gaming Section

people_also_ask.question: Is Silent Hill 2 scary?
people_also_ask.heading: Silent Hill 2 is never cheap. There are no jump scares in this game, and it still manages to be terrifying. You arrive at this town and immediately become acquainted with the looming fog. It's a visual effect that makes it feel like you have cataracts.05-Jul-2021
people_also_ask.title: 20 years later, 'Silent Hill 2' is still a disorienting masterpiece

people_also_ask.question: Will Silent Hill 2 be remastered?
people_also_ask.heading: Silent Hill 2 Can't Be Remastered That said, the unfortunate truth is that a one-to-one remaster of the game simply isn't possible. ... While plenty of those issues came down to personal preference such as the new voice cast, the technical problems that plagued the game made it feel unfinished.01-Oct-2021

knowledge_panel.description: silent hill 2 is a 2001 survival horror game developed by team silent, a group in konami computer entertainment tokyo, and published by konami. the game was released from september to november, originally for the playstation 2. wikipedia
